AsamK/signal-cli

signal-cli lets you use Signal Messenger from the command line or scripts

Related repos

  • Dockerized REST API for the Signal protocol
  • Python framework for building Signal bots
  • Displays signals and connections in a graph for Godot
  • signal algorithm for managing reactivity in frontend projects
  • Client-side database with a MongoDB-like interface
  • Extracts information from radio signals through SDR devices
  • AI chat platform with multi-model support, rich UI, and business tools
  • Logging utility for Node.js applications
  • Signal Messenger client for terminal
